body:
Currently we use `arrow::io::BufferReader` to implement a zero-copy datasource for host buffers. This is a feature we could implement ourselves and remove the last of arrow dependency in cuIO.

A requirement for this source type would be to avoid copying the data when calling `std::unique_ptr<datasource::buffer> host_read(size_t offset, size_t size)`. This is what `device_buffer_source` alrady does in its d`evice_read` implementation.

labels.name: improvement
labels.description: Improvement / enhancement to an existing function

title: Remove arrow dependency in cuIO by implementing a `host_buffer_source`
